DOC.brief_title: Fascial Manipulation Treatment Carpal Tunnel Syndrome

Fascial Manipulation intense friction perform elbow distal extremity interphalangeal articulation index finger minute promote hyperemia restore collagen fiber ability slide . The friction last 2 4 minute . In trial , 14 patient randomize two group : The intervention group receive fascial manipulation CTS group , receive fascial manipulation spot relate CTS . This last group placebo control group . The treatment perform week 5 week consecutively follow visit assessment perform 10 day 3 month end treatment .
